jobDescription: Affinity Solutions has a great entry-level opportunity for a recent college graduate in their Client Solutions and Operations department. The only requirements you MUST have are:Basic Microsoft Office suite experience (Word, Excel, Outlook)Must be a self-starter with good time management skillsStrong written and verbal communication skillsExcellent customer service and organizational skillsAbility to build strong employee relationshipsThis position is temporary to permanent, working 25 - 30 hours weekly between 9 am to 5:30 pm, Monday through Friday.
